doc.name: $_POST_RAW
doc.summary: $_POST_RAW is a binary string variable, formed by reading the content of stdin.

example.p: repeat for each item tVariablePair in $_POST_RAW
put urlDecode(item 1 of tVariablePair) into tVariableKey
put urlDecode(item 2 of tVariablePair) into tVariableValue
-- do something with key and value --

description.overview:
Use the $_POST_RAW keyword to access the raw post data.
$_POST_RAW is only available when running in CGI mode (Server).

comments.note: The $_POST_RAW keyword is useful as it provides a means to get the post data in order.
